title: Attendance
content: What should be the attendance requirement so that I can appear for esas...

comments.body: So how many slots can I miss in a subject?

Say if I miss 1 day and the teacher doesn't update the attendance for that day
Do they update it at the end so my attendance would go down at the end or do they not update for that day at all?

Usually they don't but they update it when someone of your class goes and inform her about the attendance not being uploaded and mostly they give attendance for everyone if they haven't updated on time
minimum 75 percent but it also depends on the teacher. some may be more strict about it.
